Board.name: watercycle
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Learn about the water cycle
Board.description: Tux has come back from a long fishing party on his boat. Bring the water system back up so he can take a shower.
Board.manual: Click on different active elements : sun, cloud, water pump station, and water cleanup station, in order to reactivate the entire water system. When the system is back up and Tux is in the shower, push the shower button for him.
